channel.title: Pi client help
channel.description:
ok so i use tom cache and i was adding soul split. but the spirit is dumb. when i added it iit showed a white backround. how do i get rid of it?
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2usiz5w.png[/img]

item.title: Pi client help
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

there are some colors that the client does not read , idk , check Source - Client - Sprites - Magic
usually there is a home teleport sprite there , and you will see it is surrounded in in a pink color.
take that color and apply it to your soulsplit sprite.

Read full topic
